title: Spiky Goomba

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Provoke**: Stand outside someone's house, a random visit will be redirected to you.
- **Spiky Headbonk**: Visit a target to injure them, next time they visit a Koopa member, they will be rolelocked and silenced.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You automatically attack anyone who attacks you.

desc:
Post 1411
*Spiked Goombas are Goombas with spikes on their heads.*
